content: You really need to ask that question here: Joining the military Your local recruiter will have all the answers that you need. We wish you the best. Please keep us posted. God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted.
